TopicTitle: Please add functions and parts from Damned Robotics mod!

Articles.Content:
There is a wery useful mod i found in Internet. It adds some parts :

Claw

Hinge

Truss for building arms 1 and 2m versions

The rotatron

Hydraulic cylinder

Doorhinge

And they all functional and controlable!

SacePort page: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/damnedrobotics/

It will be just adorably if developer add this parts!!!:D:D

Unfortunately, Robotics/Mechanics are on the what not to suggest list. It would indeed be nice to have in the game, though, especially for those blasted satellite dishes.

Anyway, thread locked. Have a nice day.
